text:
Today is day three of our Mekong Delta Tour
and we have just finished visiting a fishing

village and now we are going to be visiting
some of the other communities along the river.

We're just cruising down the river and we
can see all of these different floating homes.

Today we are visiting the Cham community,
which is an Islamic Village in the South of

We're going to be visiting a fishing farm
where we're going to be feeding fish.
